      • init

        protected void init()
        Description copied from class: AbstractNetworkModule
        Called at the beginning of AbstractNetworkModule.main(). The module is already connected and AbstractNetworkModule.send(SimulationEvent) works.
        Specified by:
        init in class AbstractNetworkModule

      • terminate

        protected void terminate()
        Description copied from class: AbstractNetworkModule
        Called automatically at the end of AbstractNetworkModule.main(). It's guaranteed to be called. Use it to release used resources. It doesn't interrupt AbstractNetworkModule.main(). Don't call this manually, if using 'main'.
        Specified by:
        terminate in class AbstractNetworkModule
